entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
